analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/41/0xd871242910d43a697bcc9f57947777757b7469aa.sol:
	Contract NUToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xd871242910d43a697bcc9f57947777757b7469aa.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

NUToken.retreiveTokens (/unique_chucks/41/0xd871242910d43a697bcc9f57947777757b7469aa.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(owner,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd871242910d43a697bcc9f57947777757b7469aa.sol)

Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/41/0xd871242910d43a697bcc9f57947777757b7469aa.sol#275-276)
